sentence: To receive further updates on this Salesforce.com, Inc. (NYSE: CRM ) trade as well as an alert when it's time to take profits, sign up for a risk-free trial of SlingShot Trader today.
Today, we're opening a new bearish trade on Salesforce.com ( CRM ).
Despite Oracle ( ORCL )'s protests that their weak earnings report was due to "transient" issues, we are skeptical that the commercial software business isn't due for a correction.
Spending is still down, and premiums look very high.
CRM is attractive from a bearish perspective because it swims in the same environment as ORCL and is significantly less able to withstand market volatility from a fundamental standpoint.
We believe CRM is under resistance and likely to head towards support in the near term, especially if analysts use the baseline provided by ORCL to downgrade the stock.
